result.execSummary:
The defendant Desmond R Poling was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate w/o Valid License(2nd w/in3 Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Defendant granted a payment plan of $50 per month to be added on to current payment plan defendant has in the Clerk of Court's office.
Defendant currently serving jail term on another case, sentence commences on this case 8/15/2015. Defendant is granted privileges set forth in Wis Stats 303.08

Defendant Desmond R Poling in court with attorney Rachel Marie Alme-Boaz.  Defendant in custody. Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant enters guilty plea. Court examines defendant, finds him guilty and renders sentence. Court orders defendant submit a DNA sample.

State by ADA Sisley.  Defendant in custody & appearing in custody and with Atty Alme Boaz.  This case called with 14CF164 set for sentencing today and warrant return 14TR4813. Court orders $100 signature bond.  Court orders 14TR4813 to track with this case.   Court orders matter adj to 3/2 at 8:45 am for plea hearing on both matters.
